name: super egg 2020
description:
Super Egg 2020 is the player will play a super egg throwing animal, the egg will explode, destroy the small monster, also can climb out of the small monster, in a variety of obstacles, reasonable through the egg blasting.

Players need to make reasonable use of the terrain and various props to hit small monsters in the process of blasting. After eliminating all monsters, they can pass the health value door and lead to the next level.

In the game players only need to use the direction key control hen up and down around the movement, press the space bar eggs, eggs placed in a specified position.

There are a variety of props can be used for players in the game, some of the increase in power, some of the increase in the number of eggs, there is an increase in the speed of the task and so on, good command of each prop is the key to win the game.C
